subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: N.F.L.  Commissioner Roger Goodell said that the success of the 2014 Super Bowl at the Meadowlands would determine if more championship games are played outdoors at cold-weather sites.
snippet: N.F.L.  Commissioner Roger Goodell said that the success of the 2014 Super Bowl at the Meadowlands would determine if more championship games are played outdoors at cold-weather sites.
